login.title: Welcome to KhmerPodcast
login.discription: Your go-to platform for discovering and listening to podcasts in Khmer language.

register.title: Welcome to KhmerPodcast
register.termsAndConditions: By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Please enter the email associated with your account to receive a password reset OTP.
forgotPassword.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to reset your password

create.welcomeDescription: Create an Podcast episode in a few simple steps. Fill in the details below and upload your audio file to get started.
create.title: Title

banner.title: Listion to trending Khmer Podcasts all the time
banner.description: Welcome to our Khmer Podcast! Immerse yourself in the world of Khmer language podcasts, where you can discover trending shows anytime, anywhere. Stay connected to Cambodian culture and language through our curated selection of podcasts covering a wide range of topics. Start listening now and explore the richness of Khmer podcasting!
